words.source: H859 waw + indep. pron. 2ms ʾattah 'you'; KJV 'but as for thee', ESV 'but as for you', NASB 'but as for you'
H5650 waw + n.mp constr. ʿeved 'servant' + 2ms suff.; KJV 'and thy servants', ESV 'and your servants', NASB 'and your servants'
H3045 Qal perf. 1cs of יָדַע 'to know'; KJV 'I know', ESV 'I know', NASB 'I know'
H3588 conj. ki 'that, for'; KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H2962 adv. terem 'not yet, before'; KJV 'not yet', ESV 'do not yet', NASB 'do not yet'
H3372 Qal impf. 2mp + paragogic nun of יָרֵא 'to fear'; KJV 'ye will fear', ESV 'you fear', NASB 'you fear'
H6440 prep. min + n.mp constr. panim 'face'; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'YHWH'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H430 n.mp ʾelohim 'God, gods'; KJV 'God', ESV 'God', NASB 'God'
